title: Sethu Samudram that would harm Sri Lanka’s Ecology should be revivied says Karunanidhi
content: Submitted by Walter Jayawardhana Flaying the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) and the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (AIADMK) for their stand on Sethusamudram project, DMK chief M Karunanidhi on Sunday said the national party while in power had proposed the alignment for the project which involves dredging of ‘Ram Setu’ or Adam’s Bridge, which…
